mapper.sql: empId, empName, loginName, loginPwd, empAddress, empSex, empBirth, empDesc, empQQ, empEntryTime, empMajor, empEmail, empPhone, empRole
mapper.select: select empId, empName, loginName, loginPwd ,empRole from tb_employee where loginName = #{loginName}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_employee (empId, empName, loginName, loginPwd, empAddress, empSex, empBirth, empDesc, empQQ, empEntryTime, empMajor, empEmail, empPhone, empRole) values (#{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empentrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empmajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emprole,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update tb_employee
empName = #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginPwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empAddress = #{empaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empSex = #{empsex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
empBirth = #{empbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
empDesc = #{empdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empQQ = #{empqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empEntryTime = #{empentrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
empMajor = #{empmajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empEmail = #{empemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empPhone = #{empphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empRole = #{emprole,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where empId = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_employee set empName = #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginPwd = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empAddress = #{empaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empSex = #{empsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empBirth = #{empbirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, empDesc = #{empdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empQQ = #{empqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empEntryTime = #{empentrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, empMajor = #{empmajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empEmail = #{empemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empPhone = #{empphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empRole = #{emprole,jdbcType=INTEGER} where empId = #{empid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
